lead_paragraph: The debt-reduction commission has purposely done little to date so as to avoid a flammable mix of a campaign year with control of Congress in the balance.
snippet: The debt-reduction commission has purposely done little to date so as to avoid a flammable mix of a campaign year with control of Congress in the balance.

headline.main: Debt Panel Pauses Until After Elections
headline.seo: Debt Panel to Meet After Elections
headline.print_headline: Debt Panel Pauses Until After Elections
